name: MILK (UnknownStudios)
description:
!DESIGNED FOR FULL SCREEN!

Make it to the end flag without colliding with the spikes or running out of milk. Glasses of milk found on the floor regenerate the metre of milk at the top left of the screen. Its kinda self explanatory.

A and D - move character.

Space - jump.

Double tap A or D - dash.

R - restart if you are stuck or dead!

ENJOY!
